Author: xxjage
Text: 500 is dangerously low. Please eat more than that. If you can, eat 1000 calories especially with the amount that you are exercising. It still puts you in a deficit, so you will still be losing weight. Make sure to drink lots of water, electrolytes and get your vitamins and minerals, as those are all very important when you are restricting.   Also, put a trigger warning! Anything with numbers in it must have a trigger warning!
